Original: Ah, yes. That request is from the
Outland Count. Do you remember the
water mark you found before?
[Page]
It says that this time, he wants you
to search for the fire mark. What is
this about...? It sounds like fun.
[Page]
You should go to the Grand Court and
consult the Count. I am eager to hear
the tale once you are finished.
Translation: Ah, yes. That request is from the
Outland Count. Do you remember the
water mark you found before?
[Page]
It says that this time, he wants you
to search for the fire mark. What is
this about...? It sounds like fun.
[Page]
You should go to the Grand Court and
consult the Count. I am eager to hear
the tale once you are finished.

Original: I heard the story. My congratulations
on finding the fire mark with so
little to go on.
[Page]
Just as I expect from the [Guild]
Guild. It takes knowledge and quick
wit to be explorers of your caliber.
[Page]
Are you getting as excited about this
as I am? I hope another request along
these lines comes soon.
Translation: I heard the story. My congratulations
on finding the fire mark with so
little to go on.
[Page]
Just as I expect from the [Guild]
Guild. It takes knowledge and quick
wit to be explorers of your caliber.
[Page]
Are you getting as excited about this
as I am? I hope another request along
these lines comes soon.

Original: Ah, the request for the [Color:5]fire mark[Color:0]?
You're just the ones to handle that.
You can see Margherita is delighted!
[Page]
As you might guess, we found a new
document. Let me read it to you...
Translation: Ah, the request for the [Color:5]fire mark[Color:0]?
You're just the ones to handle that.
You can see Margherita is delighted!
[Page]
As you might guess, we found a new
document. Let me read it to you...

Original: "First Squad reporting. The [Color:5]fire mark[Color:0]
is confirmed as [Color:5]southwest[Color:0] of [Color:5]the water
mark[Color:0]. Exact distance unknown."
Translation: "First Squad reporting. The [Color:5]fire mark[Color:0]
is confirmed as [Color:5]southwest[Color:0] of [Color:5]the water
mark[Color:0]. Exact distance unknown."

Original: That's all. Short and to the point,
isn't it? But this is not the only
document we have this time. Here...
Translation: That's all. Short and to the point,
isn't it? But this is not the only
document we have this time. Here...

Original: "Second Squad reporting. [Color:5]Observation
points[Color:0] established at [Color:5]C-1 and C-5[Color:0].
Between them is the target.
[Page]
"We have placed an Imperial flag to
mark the observation points. You'll
have to eyeball the location."
Translation: "Second Squad reporting. [Color:5]Observation
points[Color:0] established at [Color:5]C-1 and C-5[Color:0].
Between them is the target.
[Page]
"We have placed an Imperial flag to
mark the observation points. You'll
have to eyeball the location."

Original: Ah, but don't dash off just yet. There
is a third document. This is the last
one... Here's what it says.
Translation: Ah, but don't dash off just yet. There
is a third document. This is the last
one... Here's what it says.

Original: "Command Post: The way to the key is
in connecting First and Second Squad's
reports. Find the common ground."
Translation: "Command Post: The way to the key is
in connecting First and Second Squad's
reports. Find the common ground."

Original: There, that's all. It sounds like
finding the unreactive mark with
one's eyes will be quite difficult.
[Page]
I want you to use the documents as a
guide, find the exact location, and
report it back here.
[Page]
Try to estimate where the fire mark
is from what the documents tell you.
Leave the investigation to us.
[Page]
We don't know what the mark does,
but any discovery in those lands is
a benefit to Tharsis.
Translation: There, that's all. It sounds like
finding the unreactive mark with
one's eyes will be quite difficult.
[Page]
I want you to use the documents as a
guide, find the exact location, and
report it back here.
[Page]
Try to estimate where the fire mark
is from what the documents tell you.
Leave the investigation to us.
[Page]
We don't know what the mark does,
but any discovery in those lands is
a benefit to Tharsis.

Original: Ah, hello, my friends! Have you
identified the location of the
fire mark?
Translation: Ah, hello, my friends! Have you
identified the location of the
fire mark?

Original: [Color:5]Did you identify it?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information
Translation: [Color:5]Did you identify it?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information

Original: Understandable. The document is fairly
complex this time. Here, I'll read it
for you once more.
Translation: Understandable. The document is fairly
complex this time. Here, I'll read it
for you once more.

Original: The fire mark is southwest of the
water mark. The coordinates suggest
it's down and to the left of [Color:5]A-4/1-5[Color:0].
[Page]
Somewhere in that area should be
observation points at [Color:5]C-1[Color:0] and [Color:5]C-5[Color:0].
Between them lies the fire mark.
[Page]
Even when we know the location, there
is still the matter of getting it to
react... Though we will handle that.
Translation: The fire mark is southwest of the
water mark. The coordinates suggest
it's down and to the left of [Color:5]A-4/1-5[Color:0].
[Page]
Somewhere in that area should be
observation points at [Color:5]C-1[Color:0] and [Color:5]C-5[Color:0].
Between them lies the fire mark.
[Page]
Even when we know the location, there
is still the matter of getting it to
react... Though we will handle that.

Original: You know, when I put food in my dear
Margherita's bowl, no matter how often
I tell her to wait, she never listens.
[Page]
She must hate to have things withheld
from her...
[Page]
My friends, have you ever heard the
theory that pets take after their
owners?
Translation: You know, when I put food in my dear
Margherita's bowl, no matter how often
I tell her to wait, she never listens.
[Page]
She must hate to have things withheld
from her...
[Page]
My friends, have you ever heard the
theory that pets take after their
owners?

Original: Splendid! Let's have it without delay.
Where is the [Color:5]fire mark[Color:0]?
Translation: Splendid! Let's have it without delay.
Where is the [Color:5]fire mark[Color:0]?

Original: Hmm... I see. Then that is where I
shall send my scouts.
Translation: Hmm... I see. Then that is where I
shall send my scouts.

Original: Oh, my friend, look... Margherita is
not happy at all. Why is that, you
wonder?
[Page]
There was no mark at the coordinates
you gave us. I, too, am not happy.
[Page]
I know I asked you to estimate, but
that is different from guessing at
random. I expect a serious attempt.
Translation: Oh, my friend, look... Margherita is
not happy at all. Why is that, you
wonder?
[Page]
There was no mark at the coordinates
you gave us. I, too, am not happy.
[Page]
I know I asked you to estimate, but
that is different from guessing at
random. I expect a serious attempt.

Original: Splendid work, my friends! We found
what appears to be the fire mark at
the location you gave us!
[Page]
I have nothing but the highest praise
for your excellence in analysis,
insight, and inventiveness.
[Page]
Still, as always, that mark presents
us with another mystery...
[Page]
I wonder if it was left behind by the
ones who once ruled over that land.
[Page]
But no matter--you have completed the
request, and you deserve the reward
that awaits you at the bar.
Translation: Splendid work, my friends! We found
what appears to be the fire mark at
the location you gave us!
[Page]
I have nothing but the highest praise
for your excellence in analysis,
insight, and inventiveness.
[Page]
Still, as always, that mark presents
us with another mystery...
[Page]
I wonder if it was left behind by the
ones who once ruled over that land.
[Page]
But no matter--you have completed the
request, and you deserve the reward
that awaits you at the bar.

Original: The device which reacted to the
skyship's flight... That pattern...
There are still so many mysteries.
Translation: The device which reacted to the
skyship's flight... That pattern...
There are still so many mysteries.

Original: A thorough search of your surroundings
shows the Imperial flag placed in the
soil below you.
Translation: A thorough search of your surroundings
shows the Imperial flag placed in the
soil below you.

Original: A thorough search of your surroundings
shows the Imperial flag flying from
the lake below you.
Translation: A thorough search of your surroundings
shows the Imperial flag flying from
the lake below you.

Original: You arrive at the point where you
believe the fire mark must be.
Translation: You arrive at the point where you
believe the fire mark must be.

Original: When you make a thorough search, your
belief proves to be well-founded:
here is the fire mark you sought!
[Page]
All that is left to do is to write
down its location and report back to
the Outland Count.
Translation: When you make a thorough search, your
belief proves to be well-founded:
here is the fire mark you sought!
[Page]
All that is left to do is to write
down its location and report back to
the Outland Count.

Original: When you narrow your eyes, you can see
the [Color:5]fire mark[Color:0] engraved in the land
below you...
Translation: When you narrow your eyes, you can see
the [Color:5]fire mark[Color:0] engraved in the land
below you...
